ShortDescription.Value: Prop of a Walmart Truck Trailer

Publish.LongDescription:
# Walmart Trailer Truck Hello. This mod adds a prop of a Walmart Truck Trailer
## Functions - Changeable Colors(White, Gray, Black) - Apply a font
---
## Requirements - [Write Everywhere](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/92908/Windows) â€“ required 100% ---
## Fonts Font is **included**
### How to install the font 1. Click on the W Icon on the Top-Left 2. Go to City Fonts 3. Press **+** and click on the Puzzle-Piece. 4. Choose "Tomixs Walmart Truck Trailer" 6. Select the font 7. Look at the Screenshot Font Tutorial on how to change them for Dynamic Signs
## Credits and Special Thanks - To **Klyte45** for the WriteEverywhere mod. - To **Maestro** for guiding me through this whole process ---
## Enjoy & Share Your Feedback!
Publish.ChangeLog: # Version 1.0 - Added the Prop # Version 1.0.3 - Changed the icon
